title: Categorical 4-manifold invariants from trisection diagrams
summary:
We use Gay and Kirby's description of 4-manifolds in terms of trisections and trisection diagrams to define a new 4-manifold invariant. The algebraic data are an indecomposable finite semisimple bimodule category over a pair of spherical fusion categories, equipped with a bimodule trace, and a pivotal functor from another spherical fusion category into the spherical fusion category of its bimodule endofunctors and natural transformations between them. The 4-manifold invariant has a simple description in terms of a diagrammatic calculus for this data, in which the three spherical fusion categories correspond to the three colours of the trisection diagram.
  It includes the Hopf algebraic 4-manifold invariants by Chaidez, Cotler and Cui, which arise when the bimodule category is the category of finite-dimensional complex vector spaces. We also recover the 4-manifold invariants of Bärenz and Barrett defined by a pivotal functor from a spherical fusion category into a modular fusion category.

AI.tldr: 本文基于Gay和Kirby的三分割理论定义了一个新的4-流形不变量，使用不可分解有限半单双模范畴、双模迹和球面融合范畴的枢轴函子作为代数数据，并通过图式计算描述该不变量。
AI.motivation: 利用4-流形的三分割和三分割图来描述4-流形不变量，扩展了现有的4-流形不变量理论，特别是包含了Chaidez、Cotler和Cui的Hopf代数不变量以及Bärenz和Barrett的枢轴函子不变量。
AI.method: 使用不可分解有限半单双模范畴、双模迹和球面融合范畴的枢轴函子作为代数数据，通过图式计算来描述4-流形不变量，其中三个球面融合范畴对应三分割图的三种颜色。
AI.result: 定义了一个新的4-流形不变量，该不变量包含了现有的Hopf代数4-流形不变量和由枢轴函子定义的4-流形不变量，证明了这些现有不变量都是新不变量的特例。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了一个统一的4-流形不变量框架，该框架能够包含和推广多种现有的4-流形不变量，为4-流形拓扑不变量理论提供了新的代数几何视角。

title: A note on TQFTs for orientable 2-dimensional cobordisms
summary: Topological quantum field theories (TQFTs) are symmetric monoidal functors out of cobordism categories. In dimension two, oriented TQFTs are famously classified by commutative Frobenius algebras. In the unoriented setting, the classification requires additional data: an involution and a value assigned to the Möbius strip. In this work, we describe an intermediate framework that classifies 2-dimensional TQFTs for orientable cobordisms, in an appropriate sense. Our motivation arises from skein-theoretic models of surfaces embedded in 3-manifolds and Khovanov homology, where surfaces are often treated as unoriented, even though the associated 2-dimensional TQFTs themselves need not be fully unoriented.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个中间框架，用于分类二维拓扑量子场论在可定向配边上的情况，介于完全定向和完全非定向之间。
AI.motivation: 研究动机来自于3-流形中嵌入曲面的skein理论模型和Khovanov同调，其中曲面通常被视为非定向的，但相关的二维TQFT本身不一定完全非定向。
AI.method: 描述了一个中间框架，用于分类二维TQFT在可定向配边上的情况，介于完全定向和完全非定向分类之间。
AI.result: 提出了一个分类框架，填补了完全定向和完全非定向TQFT分类之间的空白。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为处理可定向配边上的二维TQFT提供了一个中间分类框架，适用于skein理论和Khovanov同调等场景。

title: A construction of surface skein TQFTs and their extension to 4-dimensional 2-handlebodies
summary: For a commutative Frobenius algebra $A$, we construct a $(2,3,3+\varepsilon)$-dimensional TQFT $\mathsf{AFK}_A$ that assigns to a 3-manifold a skein module of embedded $A$-decorated surfaces. These surface skein modules have been first defined by Asaeda--Frohman and Kaiser using skein relations that generalize the combinatorics of Bar-Natan's dotted cobordisms. For 3-manifolds with boundary, we show that surface skein modules carry an action by a certain surface skein category associated with the boundary, which yields a gluing formalism. Our main result concerns a partial extension of $\mathsf{AFK}_A$ to dimension 4, which uses an inductive state-sum construction following Walker. As an example, the equivariant version of Lee's deformation of dotted cobordisms yields a TQFT that extends to 4-dimensional 2-handlebodies but not 3-handlebodies. Finally, we characterize the attachment of 4-dimensional 2-handles by means of a certain Kirby color and use it to compute the invariants of 4-dimensional 2-handlebodies in examples.

AI.tldr: 本文为交换Frobenius代数A构造了一个(2,3,3+ε)维TQFT，将3-流形映射到嵌入的A-装饰曲面skein模。这些曲面skein模首先由Asaeda-Frohman和Kaiser定义，推广了Bar-Natan点状配边的组合结构。对于带边界的3-流形，曲面skein模承载边界相关曲面skein范畴的作用，提供了粘合形式化。主要结果涉及将AFK_A部分扩展到4维，使用Walker的归纳状态和构造。Lee变形的等变版本产生了一个扩展到4维2-柄体但不扩展到3-柄体的TQFT。最后，通过特定Kirby颜色表征4维2-柄的附着，并在示例中计算4维2-柄体的不变量。
AI.motivation: 研究交换Frobenius代数A的拓扑量子场论(TQFT)，特别是构造能够处理嵌入的A-装饰曲面的(2,3,3+ε)维TQFT，并探索其向4维的扩展可能性。
AI.method: 使用Asaeda-Frohman和Kaiser定义的曲面skein模，推广Bar-Natan点状配边的组合结构。对于4维扩展，采用Walker的归纳状态和构造方法。通过特定Kirby颜色表征4维2-柄的附着。
AI.result: 成功构造了AFK_A TQFT，证明了曲面skein模承载边界相关曲面skein范畴的作用。实现了向4维的部分扩展，特别是对于4维2-柄体。Lee变形的等变版本产生了一个扩展到4维2-柄体但不扩展到3-柄体的TQFT。
AI.conclusion: 本文为交换Frobenius代数A建立了完整的(2,3,3+ε)维TQFT框架，并成功实现了向4维的部分扩展，为处理更高维拓扑结构提供了新的工具和方法。

title: Noetherian pointed Hopf algebras are affine
summary: Let $k$ be a field. In this paper, we introduce the notions of $\textit{reduction order}$ and $\textit{reduction-factorization}$ on words, and use them to show that any right or left Noetherian pointed Hopf algebra over $k$ is affine. This result offers a partial affirmative answer to the classical affineness question for Noetherian Hopf algebras posed by Wu and Zhang \cite{WZ2003}. For a pointed Hopf algebra $H$ over $k$, we construct a well-ordered set $X$ such that: (1) $H$ is generated, as an algebra, by the subset $X_I$ of irreducible letters (with respect to the reduction order); and (2) $X_I$ is finite whenever $H$ is right Noetherian.

AI.tldr: 本文引入约化序和约化分解的概念，证明了任何右或左Noetherian点状Hopf代数都是仿射的，为Wu和Zhang提出的Noetherian Hopf代数仿射性问题提供了部分肯定答案。
AI.motivation: 解决Wu和Zhang在2003年提出的关于Noetherian Hopf代数仿射性的经典问题，特别是针对点状Hopf代数的情况。
AI.method: 引入约化序和约化分解的概念，构造一个良序集X，使得Hopf代数由不可约字母子集生成，并在右Noetherian条件下证明该子集有限。
AI.result: 证明了任何右或左Noetherian点状Hopf代数都是仿射的，并构造了满足特定性质的良序集X。
AI.conclusion: 该结果为Noetherian Hopf代数的仿射性问题提供了部分肯定答案，特别适用于点状Hopf代数的情况。

title: Maass-Selberg relations for Whittaker functions on a real reductive group
summary: We give a complete proof of the Maass-Selberg relations for Whittaker integrals on a real reductive group. These relations were asserted In unpublished work of Harish-Chandra, and proven in the basic setting of maximal parabolic parabolic subgroups. Our proof is a reduction to the mentioned basic setting. It makes use of the action of standard intertwining operators on Whittaker distribution vectors in the generalized principal series of representations. The Maass-Selberg relations imply regularity of normalized Whittaker integrals. This is crucial for decent behavior of Fourier and wave packet transforms on the level of spherical Schwartz spaces.

AI.tldr: 本文提供了实约化群上Whittaker积分的Maass-Selberg关系的完整证明，该关系最初由Harish-Chandra在未发表工作中提出，并在极大抛物子群的基本情形下得到证明。
AI.motivation: 动机是证明Harish-Chandra在未发表工作中提出的Maass-Selberg关系，这些关系对于理解Whittaker积分的正则性和傅里叶变换的良好行为至关重要。
AI.method: 方法是通过将问题约化到极大抛物子群的基本情形，利用标准交织算子在广义主序列表示中对Whittaker分布向量的作用。
AI.result: 结果成功证明了Maass-Selberg关系，并推导出归一化Whittaker积分的正则性。
AI.conclusion: 结论是Maass-Selberg关系确保了归一化Whittaker积分的正则性，这对于球面Schwartz空间上的傅里叶和波包变换的良好行为至关重要。

title: The skein partition function of the mapping torus
summary: We compute the dimensions of $\text{GL}_N$-skein modules of genus-one mapping tori $T^2\times_γS^1$, for an arbitrary diffeomorphism of $T^2$, and for generic quantum parameter. These are most cleanly expressed via a generating function over all $N$, which we dub the skein partition function, and for which we compute an explicit Euler product expansion.

AI.tldr: 计算了GL_N-链模块在环面映射环T^2×_γS^1上的维度，针对任意环面微分同胚和通用量子参数，通过生成函数给出了明确的欧拉乘积展开。
AI.motivation: 研究GL_N-链模块在拓扑空间中的维度计算问题，特别是针对环面映射环这一重要拓扑结构，旨在建立通用的数学框架。
AI.method: 使用生成函数方法，对所有N值进行统一处理，通过欧拉乘积展开来简洁表达计算结果。
AI.result: 得到了GL_N-链模块维度的显式表达式，并以欧拉乘积形式呈现了生成函数，为相关拓扑不变量提供了新的计算方法。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了环面映射环上GL_N-链模块维度的系统理论，其欧拉乘积展开形式为后续研究提供了有力的数学工具。

title: Lattices of pretorsion classes
summary: Since their introduction, torsion theories have played a key role in the study of abelian and pointed categories. In representation theory, torsion theories and lattices of torsion classes of mod$ A$, for $A$ a finite-dimensional algebra, have been widely studied. The more recent definition of pretorsion theories, that can be given for any category, has expanded the theory, giving many more instances of ``non-pointed torsion theories'' in unexpected settings. In this work, we introduce and study the lattice $\mathcal{L}_t(A)$ of pretorsion classes of mod$ A$. These lattices are in close connection with the lattices tors$ A$ of torsion classes of mod$ A$. We fully describe the completely join-irreducible elements of $\mathcal{L}_t(A)$. Moreover, we characterise and give a full classification of when $\mathcal{L}_t(A)$ is distributive and further describe when it can be identified with the \emph{distributive closure} of tors$ A$. Finally, we show how the lattices of pretorsion classes, together with their duals, can be used to build pretorsion theories in mod$ A$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了模A的预扭类格L_t(A)，描述了其完全并不可约元素，刻画了分配性条件，并展示了如何用预扭类格构建模A中的预扭理论。
AI.motivation: 扩展扭理论到非点状范畴，研究有限维代数A的模范畴中预扭类格的性质及其与经典扭类格的关系。
AI.method: 引入模A的预扭类格L_t(A)，分析其结构特性，包括完全并不可约元素的描述、分配性条件的刻画，以及与扭类格tors A的关系研究。
AI.result: 完全描述了L_t(A)的完全并不可约元素，给出了L_t(A)分配性的充要条件及其分类，并建立了与扭类格tors A的分配闭包的联系。
AI.conclusion: 预扭类格L_t(A)与经典扭类格密切相关，可用于构建模A中的预扭理论，为扭理论在非点状范畴中的扩展提供了新视角。

title: Invitation to finite groups
summary: This is an introduction to the finite groups, with focus on the groups of permutations and reflections, and more generally, on the finite groups of unitary matrices. We first discuss the basics of group theory, featuring the cyclic, dihedral and symmetric groups, and the structure result for finite abelian groups. Then we study the complex reflection groups, with general theory and examples, classification results, and with a look into braid groups too. We then go into the study of representation theory, and of more advanced aspects, such as Tannakian duality, Brauer theorems and Clebsch-Gordan rules. Finally, we discuss, using representation theory methods, a number of advanced analytic aspects, for the most in relation with questions coming from probability.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了有限群理论，重点研究置换群和反射群，特别是有限酉矩阵群。内容包括群论基础、复反射群、表示理论以及概率问题相关的分析应用。
AI.motivation: 系统介绍有限群理论，特别是置换群和反射群的研究，为理解更复杂的群结构和表示理论奠定基础。
AI.method: 采用从基础到高级的递进方法：首先讨论群论基础知识，然后研究复反射群及其分类，接着深入表示理论，最后应用表示理论方法分析概率相关问题。
AI.result: 提供了有限群理论的全面介绍，包括循环群、二面体群、对称群的结构结果，复反射群的分类，以及表示理论在概率问题中的应用。
AI.conclusion: 有限群理论是一个丰富的研究领域，从基础的群结构到复杂的表示理论，再到实际应用如概率分析，都具有重要价值。

title: Every $Q$-polynomial distance-regular graph is sharp over $\mathbb{R}$
summary: Let $Γ$ denote a distance-regular graph with vertex set $X$ and diameter $D \geq 3$. Fix a vertex $x \in X$. Let the field $\mathbb{F}$ be either $\mathbb{R}$ or $\mathbb{C}$. Let $\operatorname{Mat}_X(\mathbb{F})$ denote the $\mathbb{F}$-algebra of matrices whose rows and columns are indexed by $X$ and all entries in $\mathbb{F}$. The Terwilliger algebra $T^\mathbb{F} = T^\mathbb{F}(x)$ is the subalgebra of $\operatorname{Mat}_X(\mathbb{F})$ generated by the adjacency matrix $A$ of $Γ$ and the dual primitive idempotents $\{E_i^*\}_{i=0}^D$ of $Γ$ with respect to $x$. Let $\{E_i\}_{i=0}^D$ denote the primitive idempotents of $A$. Assume that the ordering $\{E_i\}_{i=0}^D$ is $Q$-polynomial. Let $W$ denote an irreducible $T^\mathbb{F}$-module. We say that $W$ is sharp over $\mathbb{F}$ whenever $\dim (E_r^* W) = 1$, where $r$ is the endpoint of $W$. It is known, by Nomura and Terwilliger (2008), that every irreducible $T^\mathbb{C}$-module is sharp. In this paper, we prove that every irreducible $T^\mathbb{R}$-module is sharp. Once this is established, we obtain four additional results: (i) if $W$ is an irreducible $T^\mathbb{R}$-module, then its complexification $W^\mathbb{C}= W \otimes_{\mathbb{R}} \mathbb{C}$ is an irreducible $T^\mathbb{C}$-module; (ii) two irreducible $T^\mathbb{R}$-modules $W_1$ and $W_2$ are isomorphic if and only if their complexifications $W_1^\mathbb{C}$ and $W_2^\mathbb{C}$ are isomorphic as $T^\mathbb{C}$-modules; (iii) if $\bigoplus_{i=1}^h \operatorname{Mat}_{n_i}(\mathbb{C})$ is the Wedderburn decomposition of $T^\mathbb{C}$, then $\bigoplus_{i=1}^h \operatorname{Mat}_{n_i}(\mathbb{R})$ is the Wedderburn decomposition of $T^\mathbb{R}$; (iv) each of the subalgebras $E_1^* T E_1^*$, $E_1 T E_1$, $E_D^* T E_D^*$, and $E_D T E_D$ is commutative and every element of these algebras is a symmetric matrix.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了对于距离正则图，每个实数域上的Terwilliger代数的不可约模都是sharp的，并由此得到了四个相关结果，包括复数化保持不可约性、同构性、Wedderburn分解以及某些子代数的交换性和对称性。
AI.motivation: 研究距离正则图中Terwilliger代数的结构性质，特别是实数域和复数域上不可约模的关系，以及sharp性质在不同数域上的表现。
AI.method: 使用代数图论和表示论的方法，分析距离正则图的Terwilliger代数结构，证明实数域上不可约模的sharp性质，并推导相关代数结构性质。
AI.result: 证明了每个实数域上的Terwilliger代数的不可约模都是sharp的，并得到了四个重要结果：复数化保持不可约性和同构性、Wedderburn分解的对应关系、以及某些子代数的交换性和对称性。
AI.conclusion: 实数域和复数域上的Terwilliger代数结构具有密切的联系，实数域上的不可约模也具有sharp性质，这为理解距离正则图的代数结构提供了重要工具。

title: The quantum torus as an $\mathbb E_M$-category
summary: Given an oriented $2$-manifold $M$, a locally constant sheaf of lattices $Λ$ over $M$, and a pointed morphism $q : \textsf B^2Λ\rightarrow \textsf B^4\mathbf C^{\times}$, we define an $\mathbb E_M$-category $\mathrm{Rep}_q(\check T)$ which we call the "quantum torus" at level $q$. We explain why this terminology is deserved and calculate the factorization homology of $\mathrm{Rep}_q(\check T)$. When $M$ arises from a global complex curve, we confirm (a version of) a conjecture of Ben-Zvi and Nadler for tori.

AI.tldr: 本文定义了量子环面范畴，并计算了其分解同调，验证了Ben-Zvi和Nadler关于环面的猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究定向2-流形上的量子环面结构，为理解复曲线上的量子场论提供数学基础。
AI.method: 给定定向2-流形M、局部常值格层Λ和映射q，构造量子环面范畴Rep_q(ˇT)，并计算其分解同调。
AI.result: 成功定义了量子环面范畴，计算了其分解同调，并在全局复曲线情形下验证了Ben-Zvi-Nadler猜想。
AI.conclusion: 量子环面范畴为研究复曲线上的量子理论提供了有效框架，相关猜想得到了证实。

title: Stable equivalences and homological dimensions
comment: 29 pages. This is a revision of the part on stable equivalences in arXiv:2312.08794. New results are added. We stress that every finite-dimensional algebra over a field R is isomorphic to the centralizer of two matrices in a full matrix algebra over the field R. Thus the class of all centralizers of one matrix is an impotent part of finite-dimensonal algebras over fields
summary: As is known, every finite-dimensional algebra over a field is isomorphic to the centralizer algebra of two matrices. So it is fundamental to study first the centralizer algebra of a single matrix, called a centralizer matrix algebra. In this article, stable equivalences between centralizer matrix algebras over arbitrary fields are completely characterized in terms of a new equivalence relation on matrices. Moreover, stable equivalences of centralizer matrix algebras over perfect fields induce stable equivalences of Morita type, thus preserve dominant, finitistic and global dimensions. Our methods also show that algebras stably equivalent to a centralizer matrix algebra over a field have the same number of non-isomorphic, non-projective simple modules. Thus the Auslander--Reiten conjecture on stable equivalences holds true for centralizer matrix algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文完全刻画了任意域上中心化矩阵代数的稳定等价性，通过定义新的矩阵等价关系，并证明在完美域上这种稳定等价诱导Morita型稳定等价，保持各种同调维数。
AI.motivation: 由于每个有限维代数都同构于两个矩阵的中心化代数，因此研究单个矩阵的中心化代数（即中心化矩阵代数）是基础性的。本文旨在完全刻画这类代数的稳定等价性。
AI.method: 通过定义矩阵间的新等价关系来刻画中心化矩阵代数的稳定等价性，并在完美域上证明这种稳定等价诱导Morita型稳定等价。
AI.result: 完全刻画了任意域上中心化矩阵代数的稳定等价性；在完美域上，这种稳定等价诱导Morita型稳定等价，保持优势维数、有限维数和整体维数；证明了与中心化矩阵代数稳定等价的代数具有相同数量的非同构非投射单模。
AI.conclusion: 中心化矩阵代数的Auslander-Reiten猜想成立，即稳定等价保持非同构非投射单模的数量。

title: Algebraic versions of $\mathbb{T}^2$ and of $\mathbb{P}^1\times\mathbb{P}^1$ and Hochschild cohomology
summary: We examine the Hochschild cohomology for triangular algebras that capture some aspects of geometry and topology of the torus and of the quadric surface, and for deformations of these algebras. In particular, this shows that the cup product on Hochschild cohomology of a triangular algebra does not generally follow the intuition coming from monomial algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了三角代数的Hochschild上同调，这些代数捕捉了环面和二次曲面的一些几何拓扑特性，以及这些代数的变形。研究发现三角代数的Hochschild上同调上的杯积通常不符合单项式代数的直觉。
AI.motivation: 研究三角代数的Hochschild上同调，特别是那些能够反映环面和二次曲面几何拓扑特性的代数，以及它们的变形。目的是理解这些代数结构的同调性质。
AI.method: 通过分析三角代数的Hochschild上同调，特别是杯积结构，并与单项式代数的情况进行对比。
AI.result: 研究发现三角代数的Hochschild上同调上的杯积通常不符合从单项式代数获得的直觉，这表明三角代数的同调结构具有特殊性。
AI.conclusion: 三角代数的Hochschild上同调结构，特别是杯积，展现出与单项式代数不同的特性，这为理解更广泛代数结构的同调性质提供了新的视角。

title: Instantons on the Blown-up Surface and the Affine Vertex Algebra
summary:
Vafa-Witten observed that Yoshioka's blow-up formula for the Euler characteristics of rank $r$ instantons on an algebraic surface coincides with the character of the Wess-Zumino-Witten model for $\mathrm{SU}(r)$ at level $1$, and raised the question of finding a rational conformal field theory explanation for this striking coincidence. In this work, we provide an answer to this question by constructing and analyzing the affine $\mathrm{gl}_r$ action on various cohomology theories, including the Grothendieck group of coherent sheaves, Hochschild homology, Chow groups, and Hodge cohomology, of the moduli space of stable sheaves on a blown-up surface.
  A key ingredient in our proof is a representation-theoretic reformulation of the theory of Grassmannians of Tor-amplitude $[0,1]$-perfect complexes studied by the first-named author in terms of the spin representation of the finite-dimensional Clifford algebra. This may be viewed as a finite analog of the question of Vafa-Witten via the Boson-Fermion correspondence.

AI.tldr: 本文通过构造仿射gl_r作用在模空间的各种上同调理论上，为Vafa-Witten观察到的Yoshioka爆破公式与WZW模型特征之间的巧合提供了有理共形场论解释。
AI.motivation: Vafa-Witten观察到Yoshioka关于代数曲面秩r瞬子欧拉特征的爆破公式与SU(r)在1级的WZW模型特征一致，提出了寻找有理共形场论解释的问题。
AI.method: 构造仿射gl_r作用在稳定层模空间的各种上同调理论上，包括凝聚层的Grothendieck群、Hochschild同调、Chow群和Hodge上同调。关键工具是将Tor-振幅[0,1]完美复形的Grassmannian理论与有限维Clifford代数的旋量表示联系起来。
AI.result: 成功建立了爆破曲面稳定层模空间上同调理论与仿射gl_r表示理论之间的联系，为Vafa-Witten问题提供了答案。
AI.conclusion: 通过表示论方法为Vafa-Witten观察到的巧合提供了有理共形场论解释，揭示了代数几何与共形场论之间的深刻联系。

title: Rado's Graph has no Quantum Symmetry
summary: We prove that Rado's graph admits no quantum symmetries.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了Rado图不具有量子对称性
AI.motivation: 研究Rado图的量子对称性，探索图论与量子群理论的交叉领域
AI.method: 使用量子群理论和图论方法，通过分析Rado图的组合特性来证明其量子对称性的缺失
AI.result: 证明了Rado图确实不具有任何量子对称性
AI.conclusion: Rado图在量子对称性方面具有特殊性质，这一发现对理解无限图的量子对称结构具有重要意义

title: Isomeric Heisenberg and Kac-Moody categorification I
summary: We develop a general framework for studying Abelian categories arising in isomeric representation theory, that is, representation theory broadly related to the supergroup Q(n). In this first part, we introduce notions of isomeric Heisenberg categorification and isomeric Kac-Moody categorication, and explain how to pass from the former to the latter. This is analogous to the passage from Heisenberg categorification to Kac-Moody categorification developed in our previous work with Webster.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个用于研究等距表示论中阿贝尔范畴的通用框架，重点介绍了等距海森堡范畴化和等距Kac-Moody范畴化的概念，并解释了从前到后的转化过程。
AI.motivation: 研究等距表示论中与超群Q(n)相关的阿贝尔范畴，建立统一的框架来处理这类范畴理论问题。
AI.method: 开发通用框架，引入等距海森堡范畴化和等距Kac-Moody范畴化的概念，并展示从海森堡范畴化到Kac-Moody范畴化的转化方法。
AI.result: 成功构建了等距表示论中阿贝尔范畴研究的理论框架，明确了两种范畴化概念及其转化关系。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为等距表示论中的范畴研究提供了系统方法，延续了先前与Webster合作工作中从海森堡到Kac-Moody范畴化的研究思路。

title: Algebraic topology of $C^*$-algebras
summary: Any $C^*$-algebra can be regarded as a generalization of locally compact Hausdorff topological space. Here we consider a generalization of fundamental group and (co)homology theory. In result one has invariants of $C^*$-algebras such that: for any commutative $C^*$-algebra $A = C_0\left(\mathcal X \right)$ the invariants of $A$ coincide with the $\mathcal X$ ones, the theory is not trivial even for algebras having a one spectrum, e.g. containing one point only. Instead of $\mathcal X$ we consider the space $\mathcal Y$ which should not be Hausdorff. However a noncommutative $C^*$-algebra $A$ defines $\mathcal Y$ and vice-versa.

AI.tldr: 该论文将C*-代数视为局部紧Hausdorff拓扑空间的推广，提出了基本群和(上)同调理论的非交换推广，为C*-代数提供不变量。
AI.motivation: 将经典拓扑空间的基本群和同调理论推广到非交换C*-代数框架，为C*-代数提供新的拓扑不变量，即使对于单点谱的代数也能得到非平凡结果。
AI.method: 通过将C*-代数视为拓扑空间的非交换推广，构造基本群和(上)同调理论的对应物。对于交换C*-代数，这些不变量与底层拓扑空间的经典不变量一致；对于非交换情形，通过定义非Hausdorff空间Y来建立对应关系。
AI.result: 成功构建了C*-代数的不变量理论，使得：1) 对于交换C*-代数A=C₀(X)，不变量与X的经典不变量一致；2) 即使对于单点谱的代数也能得到非平凡结果；3) 非交换C*-代数A与非Hausdorff空间Y相互定义。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了C*-代数与拓扑空间之间的深刻联系，为非交换几何提供了新的拓扑工具，将经典拓扑不变量成功推广到非交换情形。

title: Height zero characters and Galois automorphisms
summary: Let $G$ be a finite group and let $p$ be a prime. In this paper, we prove a strengthened version of Brauer's height zero conjecture for the principal $p$-block of $G$ that takes the action of a certain group of Galois automorphisms into account. This answers a conjecture recently proposed by Malle, Moretó, Rizo and Schaeffer Fry. We then use this to obtain a structural result which can be seen as a Galois version of the Itô-Michler theorem.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了考虑伽罗瓦自同构群作用的Brauer高度零猜想的强化版本，并由此推导出Itô-Michler定理的伽罗瓦版本。
AI.motivation: 回答Malle、Moretó、Rizo和Schaeffer Fry最近提出的一个猜想，将伽罗瓦自同构群的作用纳入Brauer高度零猜想的研究中。
AI.method: 通过证明考虑伽罗瓦自同构群作用的Brauer高度零猜想的强化版本，特别针对主p-块进行研究。
AI.result: 成功证明了该强化版本的Brauer高度零猜想，并由此得到了Itô-Michler定理的伽罗瓦版本这一结构结果。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为有限群表示理论提供了新的视角，将伽罗瓦作用与经典的高度零猜想相结合，拓展了相关理论的应用范围。

title: Spectral torsion of the internal noncommutative geometry of the Standard Model
comment: Second version, fixed typos, expanded introduction and conclusion, 24 pages
summary: We compute the nonvanishing spectral torsion functional of the internal part of the noncommutative geometry behind the Standard Model. We show that with a suitable modification of the usual differential graded calculus it matches an analogous functional constructed in terms of the connection. We study also the impact of the torsion on the other spectral fuctionals, which correspond to geometric invariants such as volume integral, metric and Einstein tensors, and scalar curvature. We discuss the impact of the SM Yukawa couplings and the Majorana mass matrix on our results.

AI.tldr: 本文计算了标准模型背后非交换几何中内部部分的非零谱挠率泛函，展示了通过修改微分分级计算可以使其与基于连接的类似泛函匹配，并研究了挠率对其他谱泛函的影响。
AI.motivation: 研究非交换几何框架下标准模型的谱挠率泛函，探索几何不变量与物理量之间的关系，特别是SM汤川耦合和马约拉纳质量矩阵的影响。
AI.method: 通过修改通常的微分分级计算，计算非交换几何中内部部分的非零谱挠率泛函，并与基于连接的类似泛函进行比较分析。
AI.result: 发现通过合适的微分分级计算修改，谱挠率泛函可以与基于连接的泛函匹配，并揭示了挠率对其他几何不变量谱泛函的影响。
AI.conclusion: 非交换几何中的谱挠率泛函可以通过适当的数学框架与基于连接的描述相统一，SM的物理参数对几何不变量有重要影响。

title: Equivariant Koszul Duality, Modular Category $\mathcal{O}$, and Periodic Kazhdan--Lusztig Polynomials
summary: Let $G$ be a connected reductive algebraic group over an algebraically closed field of positive characteristic, $\mathfrak{g}$ be its Lie algebra, and $B$ be a Borel subgroup. We prove a formula for the dimensions of extension groups, in the principal block of the category of strongly $B$-equivariant $\mathfrak{g}$-modules (also called modular category $\mathcal{O}$), from a simple object to a costandard object, under the assumption that Lusztig's conjecture holds (which is known in large characteristic). The answer is given by a coefficient of a periodic Kazhdan--Lusztig polynomial associated with the corresponding affine Weyl group. Among other things, the proof uses a torus-equivariant version of the Koszul duality for $\mathfrak{g}$-modules constructed by the first author.

AI.tldr: 本文在Lusztig猜想成立的条件下，证明了主块中强B-等变𝔤-模的扩张群维数公式，该维数由相应仿射Weyl群的周期Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式系数给出。
AI.motivation: 研究正特征代数闭域上连通约化代数群的李代数𝔤的强B-等变模范畴（模范畴𝒪）中扩张群的维数计算问题。
AI.method: 使用第一作者构造的𝔤-模的Koszul对偶的环面等变化版本，结合Lusztig猜想成立的条件。
AI.result: 得到了从简单对象到余标准对象的扩张群维数公式，该维数等于相应仿射Weyl群的周期Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式的某个系数。
AI.conclusion: 在Lusztig猜想成立的前提下，成功建立了模范畴𝒪中扩张群维数与周期Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式系数的对应关系。

title: The Forbidden Quiver of a Link
summary: The forbidden moves in virtual knot theory can be used to unknot any knot, virtual or classical; however, multi-component crossings in links can still survive, resulting a fused link. Using the forbidden moves, we categorify fused links obtain a quiver-valued invariant of classical and virtual links we call the forbidden quiver, opening the way for functors to and from other categories. As an application we use the forbidden quiver to obtain three polynomial invariants of virtual and classical links. Since these invariants are not sensitive to single-component crossing change, they are also link homotopy invariants.

AI.tldr: 该论文利用虚拟结理论中的禁止移动来解结，并引入融合链概念，构建了禁止quiver不变量，从而获得虚拟和经典链结的多项式不变量。
AI.motivation: 研究虚拟结理论中禁止移动对链结的影响，特别是多分量交叉的存留现象，旨在构建新的链结不变量。
AI.method: 使用禁止移动对融合链进行范畴化，获得quiver值不变量（禁止quiver），并通过该quiver构造多项式不变量。
AI.result: 获得了三个多项式不变量，这些不变量对单分量交叉变化不敏感，因此也是链结同伦不变量。
AI.conclusion: 禁止quiver为虚拟和经典链结提供了新的不变量工具，开辟了与其他范畴间函子的研究路径。

title: On (super)symmetrizing forms and Schur elements of cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford algebras
summary: In this paper, we introduce Schur elements for supersymmetrizing superalgebras. We show that the cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford algebra $\mathcal{H}^f_{c}(n)$ is supersymmetric if $f=f^{(\mathtt{0})}_{\underline{Q}}$ and, symmetric if $f=f^{(\mathtt{s})}_{\underline{Q}}$ and an invertibility condition holds. In the semisimple case, we compute the Schur elements for both $\mathcal{H}^f_{c}(n)$ and the cyclotomic Sergeev algebra $\mathcal{h}^g_{c}(n)$. As applications, we define new symmetrizing forms on the Hecke-Clifford algebra $\mathcal{H}(n)$ and on the cyclotomic quiver Hecke algebras of types $A^{(1)}_{e-1}$ and $C^{(1)}_e$.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了超对称化超代数的Schur元素，证明了在特定条件下循环Hecke-Clifford代数是超对称或对称的，并在半单情况下计算了Schur元素，应用于定义新的对称化形式。
AI.motivation: 研究超对称化超代数的Schur元素理论，为Hecke-Clifford代数和循环quiver Hecke代数提供新的对称化形式。
AI.method: 引入Schur元素概念，证明循环Hecke-Clifford代数在特定参数条件下的超对称性和对称性，并在半单情况下计算Schur元素。
AI.result: 建立了循环Hecke-Clifford代数的超对称性条件，计算了Schur元素，并定义了新的对称化形式。
AI.conclusion: Schur元素理论为超对称化超代数提供了有效工具，在Hecke-Clifford代数和循环quiver Hecke代数中实现了新的对称化形式定义。

title: Cohomological vertex algebras
comment: Shortened from the previous version. 31 pages
summary: Vertex algebras (and their modules) can be described as vector spaces together with a linear operator-valued series in one parameter $z$. With the interpretation of $z$ as a coordinate at a point on a curve, one can construct algebraic structures on the moduli space of curves from $V$-modules. Here we propose a generalization of vertex algebras involving linear operators in parameters $z_1,\ldots,z_n$. One may interpret these as being the components of a set of coordinates on an $n$-dimensional algebraic variety. These are referred to as cohomological vertex algebras (CVAs): the formal punctured 1-disk underlying a vertex algebra is replaced by a ring modeling the cohomology of certain modifications of the formal $n$-disk. We prove several structural theorems for CVAs and give a definition of cohomological vertex operator algebras (CVOAs). Using a reconstruction theorem for CVAs, we provide basic examples such as the $βγ$-system, the Heisenberg CVA, and the affine Kac-Moody CVAs. We use these constructions to describe BRST reduction, leading to an analog of W-algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了共形顶点代数(CVAs)的概念，将传统顶点代数从一维形式穿孔圆盘推广到n维代数簇的坐标系统，并建立了相关结构定理和基本例子。
AI.motivation: 传统顶点代数基于一维参数z，本文旨在将其推广到多维参数系统，以便在n维代数簇的模空间上构造代数结构。
AI.method: 通过用模拟形式n维圆盘上同调的环替换传统顶点代数的形式穿孔1维圆盘，定义了共形顶点代数(CVAs)和共形顶点算子代数(CVOAs)，并证明了结构定理。
AI.result: 建立了共形顶点代数的重建定理，构造了基本例子包括βγ-系统、Heisenberg CVA和仿射Kac-Moody CVAs，并描述了BRST约化过程。
AI.conclusion: 成功将顶点代数概念推广到多维情形，为在更高维代数簇上构造代数结构提供了理论框架，并建立了与W-代数类似的结构。

title: The Superization of Hochschild's Lemma and Restricted Lie-Rinehart Superalgebras
summary: The main goal of this paper is to introduce the notion of restricted Lie-Rinehart superalgebra over a field of characteristic $p>2$, motivated by a generalization of Hochschild's lemma to the super setting. We extend Schauenburg's proof of Hochschild's lemma to Lie-Rinehart superalgebras and we prove a superized version that serves as a foundation for our construction. Building upon this, we define restricted Lie-Rinehart superalgebras, investigate their representations, construct the semi-direct product with a restricted module, and provide several examples. Finally, we construct the corresponding universal enveloping algebra and show that this algebra satisfies the expected universal property.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了在特征p>2的域上限制李-林哈特超代数的概念，推广了Hochschild引理到超代数情形，并研究了其表示、半直积构造和通用包络代数。
AI.motivation: 将Hochschild引理推广到超代数情形，为构建限制李-林哈特超代数提供理论基础。
AI.method: 扩展Schauenburg对Hochschild引理的证明到李-林哈特超代数，定义限制结构，研究表示理论，构造半直积和通用包络代数。
AI.result: 成功构建了限制李-林哈特超代数理论框架，证明了其通用包络代数满足期望的通用性质。
AI.conclusion: 建立了特征p>2域上限制李-林哈特超代数的完整理论体系，为相关代数结构研究提供了新工具。

title: PBW-deformations of smash products involving Hopf algebra of Kac-Paljutkin type
summary: Let $H_{2n^2}$ be the Kac-Paljutkin type Hopf algebra of dimension $2n^2$, $A$ its graded Koszul Artin-Schelter regular $H_{2n^2}$-module algebra of dimension $2$, $A^!$ the Koszul dual of $A$, and $A^{\mathrm{op}}_c$ the braided-opposite algebra of $A$. This paper describes $(0, 1)$-degree PBW-deformations of the smash product $A \sharp H_{2n^2}$ and those of $A^! \sharp\, H_{2n^2}$ under the condition that the Koszul dual $A^!$ of $A$ is also an $H_{2n^2}$-module algebra. Also, $0$-degree PBW-deformations of $(A \otimes^c A^{\mathrm{op}}_c) \sharp\, H_{2n^2}$ are explored, where $A \otimes^c A^{\mathrm{op}}_c$ is the associated braided tensor product algebra.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Kac-Paljutkin型Hopf代数$H_{2n^2}$的PBW变形，包括$(0,1)$-度的smash积变形和$0$-度的关联braided张量积代数变形。
AI.motivation: 研究Kac-Paljutkin型Hopf代数$H_{2n^2}$的PBW变形，探索在Koszul对偶$A^!$也是$H_{2n^2}$-模代数条件下的变形结构。
AI.method: 使用smash积$A \sharp H_{2n^2}$和$A^! \sharp H_{2n^2}$的$(0,1)$-度PBW变形，以及$(A \otimes^c A^{\mathrm{op}}_c) \sharp H_{2n^2}$的$0$-度PBW变形方法。
AI.result: 描述了在特定条件下的PBW变形结构，包括smash积和braided张量积代数的变形。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了Kac-Paljutkin型Hopf代数相关代数的PBW变形，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新视角。

title: Classification of simple commutative algebras in the Delannoy category
summary: The Delannoy category is an interesting pre-Tannakian category associated to the oligomorphic group $\mathbb{G}$ of automorphisms of the totally ordered set $(\mathbf{R}, <)$. By construction, it admits some obvious simple commutative algebras, corresponding to certain transitive $\mathbb{G}$-sets. We show that these account for all of the simple commutative algebras in the Delannoy category. Previous results of this kind have been limited to interpolation categories; since the Delannoy category cannot be obtained by interpolation, new methods are required.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Delannoy范畴中的简单交换代数，证明了由某些传递G-集对应的明显简单交换代数构成了该范畴中所有简单交换代数的完整集合。
AI.motivation: Delannoy范畴是与全序集(R,<)的自同构群G相关联的有趣预Tannakian范畴。先前的研究仅限于插值范畴，而Delannoy范畴无法通过插值获得，因此需要新的方法来研究其简单交换代数。
AI.method: 通过分析Delannoy范畴中由传递G-集对应的明显简单交换代数，并证明这些代数构成了该范畴中所有简单交换代数的完整集合。由于该范畴无法通过插值获得，研究采用了新的方法。
AI.result: 证明了Delannoy范畴中所有简单交换代数都可以由某些传递G-集对应的明显简单交换代数来完全描述。
AI.conclusion: Delannoy范畴中的简单交换代数完全由某些传递G-集对应的明显简单交换代数构成，这一结果扩展了先前仅限于插值范畴的研究范围。

title: Whittaker Modules for W type Cartan Lie superalgebras
summary:
We consider the category of Whittaker modules for the Lie superalgebra $W_{m,n}$ of vector fields on $\mathbb{C}^{(m|n)}$. For any $\mathbf{a}\in \mathbb{C}^m$ we show the equivalence between the blocks
  $Ω_{\mathbf a}^{\widetilde{W}_{m,n}}$ of the category of $(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker modules with finite-dimensional Whittaker vector spaces and the category of finite-dimensional modules over certain Lie subsuperalgebra $T_{m,n}$ of $(AW)_{m,n}$ (and also of $\mathfrak{gl}{(m,n)})$. Then we apply the covering technique to study Whittaker $W_{m,n}$-modules and describe simple modules in the category $Ω_{\mathbf a}^{{W}_{m,n}}$ of such modules with finite-dimensional Whittaker vector spaces and with non-singular ${\mathbf a}$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了李超代数 $W_{m,n}$ 的 Whittaker 模范畴，建立了 $(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker 模与 $T_{m,n}$ 李超代数有限维模之间的等价性，并利用覆盖技术描述了 $W_{m,n}$-Whittaker 模的简单模。
AI.motivation: 研究李超代数 $W_{m,n}$ 的 Whittaker 模范畴，特别是具有有限维 Whittaker 向量空间的模结构，以理解这类特殊模的分类和性质。
AI.method: 通过建立 $(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker 模与 $T_{m,n}$ 李超代数有限维模的等价性，并应用覆盖技术来研究 $W_{m,n}$-Whittaker 模。
AI.result: 证明了对于任意 $\mathbf{a}\in \mathbb{C}^m$，具有有限维 Whittaker 向量空间的 $(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker 模块 $\Omega_{\mathbf a}^{\widetilde{W}_{m,n}}$ 与 $T_{m,n}$ 李超代数的有限维模范畴等价，并描述了非奇异 $\mathbf{a}$ 情况下 $W_{m,n}$-Whittaker 模的简单模。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功建立了李超代数 Whittaker 模与特定子代数有限维模的等价关系，为理解这类模的结构提供了新的视角和方法。

title: Separating versus ordinary Noether numbers
comment: An earlier version of this material appeared before as part of arXiv:2412.08621, but has been removed from there
summary: Let $G$ be a finite group and $K$ a field containing an element of multiplicative order $|G|$. It is shown that if $G$ has a cyclic subgroup of index at most $2$, then the separating Noether number over $K$ of $G$ coincides with the Noether number over $K$ of $G$. The same conclusion holds when $G$ is the direct product of a dihedral group and the $2$-element group. On the other hand, the smallest non-abelian groups $G$ are found for which the separating Noether number over $K$ is strictly less than the Noether number over $K$. Along the way the exact value of the separating Noether number is determined for all groups of order at most $16$. The results show in particular that unlike the ordinary Noether number, the separating Noether number of a non-abelian finite group may well be equal to the separating Noether number of a proper direct factor of the group.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了有限群的分离Noether数与Noether数之间的关系，发现在某些群结构下两者相等，而在某些非阿贝尔群中分离Noether数严格小于Noether数。
AI.motivation: 研究有限群的分离Noether数与Noether数之间的关系，探索在什么条件下这两个不变量相等，以及它们之间的差异。
AI.method: 通过分析具有特定结构的有限群（如具有循环子群且指数不超过2的群、二面体群与2元群的直积等），计算它们的分离Noether数和Noether数，并进行比较。
AI.result: 发现当群具有循环子群且指数不超过2时，分离Noether数等于Noether数；对于某些非阿贝尔群，分离Noether数严格小于Noether数；确定了所有阶数不超过16的群的分离Noether数精确值。
AI.conclusion: 与普通Noether数不同，非阿贝尔有限群的分离Noether数可能等于其真直因子的分离Noether数，这表明分离Noether数具有不同的代数性质。

title: Triality and Functoriality
comment: 48 pages v2 : minor corrections, new subsection 7.7 discussing a few examples
summary: We use the triality automorphism of simple algebraic groups of type $D_4$ to prove some new instances of global Langlands functorial lifting. In particular, we prove the (weak) spin lifting from ${\rm GSp}_6$ to ${\rm GL}_8$ and the tensor product lifting from ${\rm GL}_2 \times {\rm GSp}_4$ to ${\rm GL}_8$. As an arithmetic application, we establish the expected properties of the spinor L-function attached to an arbitrary Siegel modular cusp form for ${\rm Sp}_6(\mathbb{Z})$ generating a holomorphic discrete series.

AI.tldr: 本文利用D4型简单代数群的三元自同构证明了全局Langlands函子性提升的新实例，特别是从GSp6到GL8的自旋提升和从GL2×GSp4到GL8的张量积提升。作为算术应用，为Sp6(Z)上生成全纯离散系列的任意Siegel模形式建立了自旋L函数的预期性质。
AI.motivation: 研究全局Langlands函子性提升的新实例，特别是利用D4型代数群的特殊结构来证明自旋提升和张量积提升，从而深化对Langlands对应关系的理解。
AI.method: 利用D4型简单代数群的三元自同构性质，通过代数群表示论的方法证明全局Langlands函子性提升，包括从GSp6到GL8的自旋提升和从GL2×GSp4到GL8的张量积提升。
AI.result: 成功证明了自旋提升（从GSp6到GL8）和张量积提升（从GL2×GSp4到GL8）这两个新的全局Langlands函子性提升实例，并为Sp6(Z)上生成全纯离散系列的Siegel模形式建立了自旋L函数的预期性质。
AI.conclusion: D4型代数群的三元自同构为证明全局Langlands函子性提升提供了有效工具，所证明的自旋提升和张量积提升丰富了Langlands对应理论，并为Siegel模形式的自旋L函数研究提供了理论基础。

title: Sigma models from Gaudin spin chains
summary: We solve the classical and quantum problems for the 1D sigma model with target space the flag manifold $\mathrm{U}(3)\over \mathrm{U}(1)^3$, equipped with the most general invariant metric. In particular, we explicitly describe all geodesics in terms of elliptic functions and demonstrate that the spectrum of the Laplace-Beltrami operator may be found by solving polynomial (Bethe) equations. The main technical tool that we use is a mapping between the sigma model and a Gaudin model, which is also shown to hold in the $\mathrm{U}(n)$ case.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了具有旗流形目标空间的1D sigma模型，通过椭圆函数显式描述所有测地线，并利用与Gaudin模型的映射求解Laplace-Beltrami算子的谱。
AI.motivation: 研究一般不变度量下旗流形上的经典和量子sigma模型问题，探索其几何和谱特性。
AI.method: 使用椭圆函数显式描述测地线，建立sigma模型与Gaudin模型的映射关系，通过求解多项式（Bethe）方程获得谱。
AI.result: 成功描述了所有测地线，证明了Laplace-Beltrami算子的谱可以通过求解Bethe方程获得，并将映射推广到U(n)情况。
AI.conclusion: 建立了旗流形sigma模型与Gaudin模型之间的映射关系，为研究此类模型的几何和量子特性提供了有效工具。

title: Structure of the $\mathcal{N}=4$ chiral algebra
comment: 22 pages; v2: typos corrected, references added, JHEP version
summary: The chiral algebra of 4D $\mathcal{N}=4$ SU$(N)$ super-Yang-Mills theory is an $\mathcal{N}=4$ superconformal vertex operator algebra. We analyse the structure of this algebra by studying recursively the constraints that are required by the associativity of the operator product expansion. We find that the algebra is uniquely characterized by the central charge (which can take an arbitrary value), without any additional free parameter. Furthermore, the truncation pattern of the OPE coefficients suggests that the algebra cannot arise from the symmetric orbifold.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了4D N=4 SU(N)超杨-米尔斯理论的手性代数结构，发现该代数由中心电荷唯一确定，没有额外自由参数，且不能来自对称轨道折叠。
AI.motivation: 研究4D N=4 SU(N)超杨-米尔斯理论的手性代数结构，理解其通过算子积展开结合性约束的递归特性。
AI.method: 通过递归分析算子积展开的结合性约束，研究手性代数的结构特性。
AI.result: 发现该代数由中心电荷唯一确定（中心电荷可取任意值），没有任何额外自由参数，且OPE系数的截断模式表明该代数不能来自对称轨道折叠。
AI.conclusion: 4D N=4 SU(N)超杨-米尔斯理论的手性代数具有独特的结构特征，完全由中心电荷决定，且与对称轨道折叠构造不兼容。

title: Decomposing Multiparameter Persistence Modules
comment: 45 pages, 17 figures, to be partially published in the proceedings of SOCG 2025
summary: Dey and Xin (J.Appl.Comput.Top., 2022, arXiv:1904.03766) describe an algorithm to decompose finitely presented multiparameter persistence modules using a matrix reduction algorithm. Their algorithm only works for modules whose generators and relations are distinctly graded. We extend their approach to work on \emph{all} finitely presented modules and introduce several improvements that lead to significant speed-ups in practice. Our algorithm is fixed parameter tractable with respect to the maximal number of relations with the same degree and with further optimisation we obtain an $O(n^3)$ algorithm for interval-decomposable modules. In particular, we can decide interval-decomposability in this time. As a by-product to the proofs of correctness we develop a theory of parameter restriction for persistence modules. Our algorithm is implemented as a software library \textsc{aida} which is the first to enable the decomposition of large inputs. We show its capabilities via extensive experimental evaluation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种改进的多参数持久性模块分解算法，能够处理所有有限表示模块，相比之前只适用于生成元和关系具有不同分级的限制，实现了更广泛的适用性和显著的速度提升。
AI.motivation: 现有算法只能处理生成元和关系具有不同分级的有限表示模块，限制了其应用范围。本文旨在开发一个能够处理所有有限表示模块的通用分解算法。
AI.method: 扩展了Dey和Xin的矩阵约简算法，引入了参数限制理论，开发了固定参数可处理算法，并对区间可分解模块实现了O(n^3)时间复杂度的优化算法。
AI.result: 成功开发了aida软件库，首次能够分解大规模输入，并通过广泛的实验评估展示了其能力。算法能够决定区间可分解性，并在实践中实现了显著的速度提升。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的改进算法突破了原有方法的限制，为多参数持久性模块的分解提供了更通用和高效的解决方案，特别是对于区间可分解模块实现了多项式时间算法。

title: On the Classification of Schubert Varieties in Partial Flag Varieties
summary: We generalize the classification of isomorphism classes of Schubert varieties in complete flag varieties G/B to a class of partial flag varieties G/P. In particular, we classify all Schubert varieties in G/P where P is a minimal parabolic subgroup and all Schubert surfaces. We also obtain several pairs of isomorphisms of Schubert varieties from folding the root system. This allows us to find an upper bound of the cardinality of isomorphism classes of Schubert three-folds.

AI.tldr: 该论文将完全旗流形G/B中Schubert簇的同构分类推广到部分旗流形G/P，特别对最小抛物子群P的情况和所有Schubert曲面进行了分类，并通过根系折叠获得多对同构Schubert簇，从而得到Schubert三簇同构类数量的上界。
AI.motivation: 将完全旗流形中Schubert簇的同构分类理论扩展到更一般的部分旗流形情形，研究特定类型子群下的Schubert簇结构。
AI.method: 通过根系折叠技术构造Schubert簇的同构对，并对最小抛物子群P和Schubert曲面进行系统分类。
AI.result: 获得了最小抛物子群P下所有Schubert簇的完整分类，所有Schubert曲面的分类，以及通过根系折叠得到的多对同构Schubert簇。
AI.conclusion: 成功将Schubert簇的同构分类从完全旗流形推广到部分旗流形，并得到了Schubert三簇同构类数量的上界估计。

title: Cyclotomic nil-Brauer and Singular Soergel bimodules of type D
summary: We introduce a new family of monoidal categories which are cyclotomic quotients of the nil-Brauer category. We construct a monoidal functor from the cyclotomic nil-Brauer category to another monoidal category constructed from singular Soergel bimodules of type D. We conjecture that our functor is an equivalence of categories. Although we can prove neither fullness nor faithfulness at this point, we are able to show that the functor induces an isomorphism at the level of Grothendieck rings. We compute these rings and their canonical bases, and give diagrammatic descriptions of the corresponding primitive idempotents.

AI.tldr: 本文引入了一类新的幺半范畴——零-Brauer范畴的循环商，并构造了从循环零-Brauer范畴到D型奇异Soergel双模构造的幺半范畴的幺半函子，推测该函子是范畴等价。
AI.motivation: 研究零-Brauer范畴的循环商与D型奇异Soergel双模构造的幺半范畴之间的关系，探索范畴等价的可能性。
AI.method: 构造从循环零-Brauer范畴到D型奇异Soergel双模构造的幺半范畴的幺半函子，并在Grothendieck环层面证明同构。
AI.result: 证明了函子在Grothendieck环层面诱导同构，计算了这些环及其典范基，并给出了相应本原幂等元的图解描述。
AI.conclusion: 虽然无法证明函子的满性和忠实性，但在Grothendieck环层面建立了同构关系，为范畴等价猜想提供了支持。

title: Auslander-Reiten translations in the monomorphism categories of exact categories
summary: Let $Λ$ be a finite dimensional algebra. Let $\mathcal C$ be a functorially finite exact subcategory of $Λ$-mod with enough projective and injective objects and $\mathcal S (\mathcal C)$ be its monomorphism category. It turns out that the category $\mathcal S (\mathcal C)$ has almost split sequences. We show an explicit formula for the Auslander-Reiten translation in $\mathcal S (\mathcal C)$. Furthermore, if $\mathcal C$ is a stably $d$-Calabi-Yau Frobenius category, we calculate objects under powers of Auslander-Reiten translation in the triangulated category $\overline{\mathcal S(\mathcal C)}$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了有限维代数Λ的函子有限精确子范畴C的单态射范畴S(C)的Auslander-Reiten理论，给出了Auslander-Reiten平移的显式公式，并在C是稳定d-Calabi-Yau Frobenius范畴时计算了三角化范畴中Auslander-Reiten平移幂下的对象。
AI.motivation: 研究有限维代数Λ的函子有限精确子范畴C的单态射范畴S(C)的Auslander-Reiten理论，特别是Auslander-Reiten平移的显式描述，以及在特殊结构下的进一步结果。
AI.method: 使用范畴论方法，研究函子有限精确子范畴C的单态射范畴S(C)，证明该范畴具有几乎可裂序列，并推导Auslander-Reiten平移的显式公式。当C是稳定d-Calabi-Yau Frobenius范畴时，进一步分析三角化范畴中的Auslander-Reiten平移幂。
AI.result: 证明了单态射范畴S(C)具有几乎可裂序列，给出了Auslander-Reiten平移的显式公式。当C是稳定d-Calabi-Yau Frobenius范畴时，计算了三角化范畴中Auslander-Reiten平移幂下的对象。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功建立了单态射范畴S(C)的Auslander-Reiten理论，提供了Auslander-Reiten平移的显式描述，并在特殊结构下获得了进一步的结果，为相关范畴的表示理论提供了重要工具。

title: Deformation of moduli spaces of meromorphic $G$-connections on $\mathbb{P}^{1}$ via unfolding of irregular singularities
comment: 92 pages. Minor corrections have been made
summary:
Unfolding singular points in linear differential equations is a classical technique for studying the properties of irregular singularities by relating them to regular singularities. In this paper, we propose a general framework for unfolding unramified irregular singularities of meromorphic connections on the trivial principal $G$-bundle over $\mathbb{P}^{1}$.
  One of our main results is the description of the unfolding of singularities in terms of deformations of their moduli spaces. We show that every moduli space of irreducible meromorphic $G$-connections with unramified irregular singularities on $\mathbb{P}^{1}$ can be deformed into a moduli space of irreducible Fuchsian $G$-connections on $\mathbb{P}^{1}$.
  Furthermore, we study the unfolding of additive Deligne-Simpson problems, in which the unfolding of irregular singularities naturally generates a family of such problems. As an application of our main result, we prove that a Deligne-Simpson problem for $G$-connections with unramified irregular singularities admits a solution if and only if every unfolded Deligne-Simpson problem in the family admits a simultaneous solution.
  We also provide a combinatorial and diagrammatic framework of the unfolding process in terms of spectral types and unfolding diagrams. Finally, we address a conjecture proposed by Oshima concerning the existence of irreducible $G$-connections that realize prescribed spectral types and their unfoldings. Our main result gives an affirmative answer to this conjecture.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个展开线性微分方程中无分支不规则奇点的通用框架，通过将不规则奇点与正则奇点联系起来研究其性质。
AI.motivation: 研究无分支不规则奇点的展开过程，通过变形模空间来描述奇点展开，并解决相关的Deligne-Simpson问题。
AI.method: 使用模空间变形的方法，将不可约亚纯G-连接的无分支不规则奇点模空间变形为Fuchsian G-连接的模空间。
AI.result: 证明了无分支不规则奇点的Deligne-Simpson问题有解当且仅当所有展开的Deligne-Simpson问题同时有解，并证实了Oshima猜想。
AI.conclusion: 建立了一个完整的无分支不规则奇点展开理论框架，解决了相关存在性问题，为研究线性微分方程的奇点结构提供了新工具。

title: On $4n$-dimensional neither pointed nor semisimple Hopf algebras and the associated weak Hopf algebras
summary: For a class of neither pointed nor semisimple Hopf algebras $H_{4n}$ of dimension $4n$, it is shown that they are quasi-triangular, which universal $R$-matrices are described. The corresponding weak Hopf algebras $\mathfrak{w}H_{4n}$ and their representations are constructed. Finally, their duality and their Green rings are established by generators and relations explicitly. It turns out that the Green rings of the associated weak Hopf algebras are not commutative even if the Green rings of $H_{4n}$ are commutative.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了维度为4n的一类非点状非半单Hopf代数H_{4n}的准三角结构，构造了对应的弱Hopf代数𝔴H_{4n}及其表示，并建立了它们的对偶性和Green环。
AI.motivation: 研究非点状非半单Hopf代数H_{4n}的准三角结构，探索对应的弱Hopf代数构造及其表示理论，并分析它们的代数结构性质。
AI.method: 描述了H_{4n}的通用R-矩阵，构造了弱Hopf代数𝔴H_{4n}及其表示，通过生成元和关系建立了对偶性和Green环。
AI.result: 证明了H_{4n}是准三角的，构造了对应的弱Hopf代数及其表示，建立了明确的Green环生成关系，发现弱Hopf代数的Green环即使当H_{4n}的Green环可交换时也是不可交换的。
AI.conclusion: 成功构造了H_{4n}对应的弱Hopf代数𝔴H_{4n}，建立了完整的表示理论和代数结构，揭示了弱Hopf代数Green环的非交换性质。
